title: Section, Inro In Five Sections, "Lacquer box", 19th century
medium: Lacquered wood, ivory, bronze, silk cord
provenance: Ex-collection of F.W. Hunter; American Art Association Sale 1903, no. 196.
description: Five sections, with an elephant and three flying birds in rubbed lacquer (togidashi), gold, silver, and red on black (ro-iro) background.  Inside gold nashiji lacquer.  Mounted with ojime 1952-164-36 and netsuke 1952-164-37.

tombstone.epitaph:
Section, Inro In Five Sections, "Lacquer box", 19th century.
19th century. Lacquered wood, ivory, bronze, silk cord. Gift of Anonymous Donor. 1952-164-35-a/e.
